thread.title: Gender-affirming care halted at Arizona's largest children's hospital
thread.title_full: Gender-affirming care halted at Arizona's largest children's hospital

author: @azfamily
title: Gender-affirming care halted at Arizona's largest children's hospital
text:
Updated: 7 minutes ago
|It's been dubbed the "bounty bill," and would pay Arizona law enforcement officers for every illegal immigrant deported. Political editor Dennis Welch reports.
Updated: 10 minutes ago
|Experts say flying is the safest it has ever been. Alexis Dominguez reports.
Updated: 13 minutes ago
|A 12-month-old boy has been rushed to the hospital after an incident at a West Valley home. Michael Raimondi reports.
Updated: 1 hour ago
|The bill allowing law agencies to shoot down border drones is uncertain as it has been pulled from the State House agenda.
Updated: 2 hours ago
|Phoenix PD, the DEA and other agencies took part in a seven-month operation that led to the seizure of 1.7 million fentanyl pills, meth and other drugs.
